title: 03: What the heck is Typed Array
intro: Why does Canvas use Typed Array to handle data? Why can't we use regular Array? Let's look into Typed Array - what it is and when to use them.

title: 02: Drawing with Data
intro: In the previous post, we copied an image into 2d canvas and extracted the underlying data. The result was an array of rgba values. Let's edit this data and draw something with it.

title: 01: Getting image on canvas with 2d context
intro: Hi there! This will be a series of blog posts exploring image processing technique with a browser and HTML5 Canvas. Before we start and dive into filters and effects, let's start by looking at how image data is handled on the canvas.
